definitions.definition: A white crystalline bitter alkaloid , chemical formula C 29 H 40 N 2 O 4 , extracted from ipecacuanha root, and formerly used in the treatment of amebic infections and as an emetic in aversion therapy .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) A white crystalline bitter alkaloid , chemical formula C 29 H 40 N 2 O 4 , extracted from ipecacuanha root, and formerly used in the treatment of amebic infections and as an emetic in aversion therapy .
